productDetailsInfoText: Have your product documents ready before you continue. Make sure the entry document is issued by the UK or a third country.
documentIssuedInTheUK: Was the entry document issued in the UK?
documentIssuedInTheUKHint: This is the last document used to bring the product into the UK.
entryDocumentHint: Enter the entry document reference number, including any hyphens, dashes or other characters. For example: GBR-2024-CC-BEFCD6036
entryDocumentGuidanceTextOne: The UK entry document is the official paperwork that allowed the product to enter the UK.
entryDocumentGuidanceTextTwo: Make sure the document is one of the following:
supportingDocumentsHint: If your UK entry document is a processing statement, you must provide the reference number for any supporting documents.
supportingDocumentsGuidanceTextOne: Supporting documents are additional records that back up the information in your UK entry document.
supportingDocumentsGuidanceTextTwo: If you’re using a processing statement, you’ll need to include the reference number for each supporting document.
speciesNameText: Food and agriculture organisation (FAO) code or species name
speciesNameHintText: Start typing a species name or FAO code to see suggestions, for example Atlantic cod or COD.
speciesNameGuidanceTextOne: Some species are exempt from this requirement:
speciesNameGuidanceTextThree: list of exempt species on europa.eu (opens in new tab)
commodityHintText: Start typing to search for the correct commodity code for your fish product.
commodityCodeGuidanceTextTwo: UK Integrated Online Tariff to find the correct commodity code (opens in new tab)
productDescriptionHint: The details entered here will appear on your document and must be legible in English. For example, Battered cod fillets
netWeightOfProductOnArrival: Net weight of the product on arrival
netWeightOfProductOnArrivalOptional: Net weight of the product on arrival (optional)
netWeightOfProductOnArrivalHint: This is the weight of the whole product, including all ingredients – not just the fish. For example, a fish pie weighing 350g.
netWeightOfFisheryProductOnArrival: Net weight of fishery products on arrival
netWeightOfFisheryProductOnArrivalOption: Net weight of fishery products on arrival (optional)
netWeightOfFisheryProductOnArrivalHint: This is the weight of the fish only – do not include any other ingredients. For example, 200g of cod used in a fish pie.
weightOnCcHint: Total weight on document for the selected commodity code in kg
